meanings.definition: Treat or coat with an odorizing substance.
meanings.sent1: I am odorizing the room with a fresh spray.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys odorizing her clothes with scented sachets.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was funny to help with odorizing the house.
meanings.sent4: The chef was odorizing the kitchen with the aroma of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent5: The flowers were odorizing the entire garden with their sweet fragrance.

meanings.definition: To give a pleasant or distinctive smell to something.
meanings.sent1: After baking, the cookies were odorizing the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The perfume was odorizing the air around her.
meanings.sent3: The scented candles were odorizing the room with calming scents.
meanings.sent4: The fresh laundry was odorizing the entire house.
meanings.sent5: The bakery was odorizing the street with the smell of freshly baked bread.
